text: Harris raised $200M in first week of White House campaign and signed up 170,000 volunteers  —  Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign has raised $200 million since she emerged as the likely Democratic presidential nominee last week, an eyepopping haul in her race against the Republican nominee, former President Donald Trump.
